name: Mocha Shortbread Cookies
description:
Rich, tender, and crumbly shortbread cookies. The perfect blend of buttery and light that results in a cookie equally as rich as it is delicate. Any of our flavored shortbread cookies can be made into flowers. Colors can be changed as well!

These cookies are perfect with a hot cup of coffee or tea.

This listing is for one package of twenty (20) cookies and each is roughly 1.5" in diameter.

Also available in other flavors! Please check our other listings.

We use only the finest quality ingredients in our treats. If you have any allergy concerns, please contact us.

**FREE shipping on orders of three items or more!**

name: Not Your Mom's... Chocolate Chip Cookies
description:
Always the perfect treat. Classic chocolate chip cookie- crisp on the outside, chewy in the center. You will not be able to have just one!

Deliciously chocolatey, all you need to pair with these is a tall glass of milk. Though we've heard they taste great with a glass of red wine as well. Always made from scratch, nothing pre-packaged.

This listing is for one package of one dozen (12) cookies and each is roughly 2" in diameter.

We use only the finest quality ingredients in our treats. If you have any allergy concerns, please contact us.

**FREE shipping on orders of three items or more!**
